snippet: A report from Kuwait says Prisoner X, identified as an Australian-Israeli man, was involved in a 2010 assassination in Dubai and had provided “names and pictures” to the authorities there.
abstract: Kuwaiti newspaper Al Jarida reports that Ben Zygier, Australian-Israeli man identified as Prisoner X, may have been involved in 2010 assassination of Hamas official Mahmoud al-Mabhouh; incident was among most embarrassing in history of Israel's intelligence agency Mossad.

byline.contributor: Mayy El Sheikh contributed reporting from Cairo, and Myra Noveck from Jerusalem.

lead_paragraph: A report from Kuwait says Prisoner X, identified as an Australian-Israeli man, was involved in a 2010 assassination in Dubai and had provided “names and pictures” to the authorities there.

headline.seo: Israel’s Prisoner X Linked to Dubai Assassination in New Report
headline.main: Israel’s Prisoner X Is Linked to Dubai Assassination in a New Report
headline.print_headline: Israel’s Prisoner X Is Linked to Dubai Assassination in a New Report
